definition: to chop up (meat etc)/to chop off (sb's hand etc)
to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary

sentences.english: Spread some chopped onions over the fish before it's served.
sentences.chinese: 上菜之前，先在鱼上撒点剁碎的洋葱。

sentences.english: Finely chop the almonds and prepare a sheet pan with parchment.
sentences.chinese: 把杏仁剁碎，准备一个羊皮纸内衬平底锅。

sentences.english: Onions must be chopped up to make a salad.
sentences.chinese: 要做凉拌菜得把洋葱剁碎。

sentences.english: Finely chop the reserved dill leaves and keep the rest for garnishing .
sentences.chinese: 将保留下来的刁草叶剁碎，以备装饰。

sentences.english: Sliced carrots and chopped omelets can also be added as fillings.
sentences.chinese: 切片的胡萝卜和剁碎的煎鸡蛋也可以作为馅料。

sentences.english: She chopped onions to put in the stew.
sentences.chinese: 她把洋葱剁碎放进炖肉中。

sentences.english: I minced the lean meat finely before making dumplings.
sentences.chinese: 包饺子前，我把瘦肉细细剁碎。

sentences.english: You can make this with diced shrimp as well.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以用剁碎的虾仁来做锅贴。

sentences.english: Cool the langoustines quickly, then chop the flesh.
sentences.chinese: 捞出小龙虾迅速冷却，然后将虾肉剁碎。

sentences.english: He chopped a banana, to put on top of the girls’ cornflakes.
sentences.chinese: 他剁碎了一只香蕉，要放在女孩儿们的脆玉米片上。

sentences.english: Chop the carrots for the stew.
Roughly chop greens along with leaves of a half bunch parsley and a bunch tarragon.
sentences.chinese: 剁碎它并且加入一些芫荽及一束龙蒿。

sentences.english: Mince the garlic and fry them until crispy and golden over the medium heat.
sentences.chinese: 蒜头剁碎后用中油温将其炸至金黄色。

sentences.english: Cauls mouldy tripes windpipes faked and minced up . puzzle find the meat.
sentences.chinese: 把胎膜发霉的肺脏以及气管剁碎，搅和在一起来冒充。

sentences.english: Garlic needs to be chopped or crushed to produce the these sulfides.
sentences.chinese: 大蒜需要剁碎或压碎以制造这些硫化物。

sentences.english: Chop spring onion and ginger root; then combine with sherry, sugar and salt.
sentences.chinese: 把葱和姜剁碎，和加饭酒，砂糖及盐混合。

definition: to cut up (into pieces)/to slice/to carve/to dice/to shred
